card.name: Invocation of Ruin
card.text: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a noncreature spell with mana value greater than three and less than seven. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Then, shuffle.

card.name: Singularity’s Wake
card.text: As long as Singularitys Wake is in your graveyard or exile, if a card you own would be put into your graveyard or exiled, put it on the bottom of your library instead.

card.name: Planar Fracture
card.text: Cascade. Return up to one target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Temporal Outburst
card.text: Cascade. Each opponent sacrifices a creature or artifact.

card.name: Ethereal Tumult
card.text: Cascade. Shuffle all creatures into their owners' libraries.

card.name: Sunken Cavern
